Berserker.desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Berserkers leap to the nearest enemy. Berserkers have a chance to hit all units in a cone in front of them with their attacks

Lunar.desc: Moonlight transforms unit durability into a win condition for team comps that are built with drawn out battles in mind.
stats: Every 7 seconds, your team gains 15% Critical Strike Chance, 15% Critical Strike Damage, and 15% Spell Power. (Stacks up to 4 times)

Crystal.desc: Crystal Champions have a maximum amount of damage they can take from a single hit.

Electric.desc: Electric Champions shock nearby enemies whenever they deal or receive a critical strike

stats: At the start of combat, a random Woodland Champion makes a copy of themselves

Inferno.desc: Inferno spell damage and critical strikes burns the ground beneath the target, dealing a percent of that spell's pre-mitigation damage as magic damage over 4 seconds
stats: 70% Damage, Hexes that light on fire: 1
150% Damage, Hexes that light on fire: 3
250% Damage, Hexes that light on fire: 5

Light.desc: When a Light Champion dies, all other Light Champions gain Attack Speed and are healed for 20% of their Maximum Health

Mage.desc: Mages have a chance on cast to instead Doublecast

stats: At the start of combat, a random ally gains a 1500 health Stoneshield

Ocean.desc: All allies restore mana every 4 seconds

stats: Poison Champions apply Neurotoxin when they deal damage, increasing the target's mana cost by 33%
Poison.abstract:
team: (无团队增益)  
bond: (无羁绊内增益)  
**解析**：  
- **desc** 为空，未提供明确的团队或羁绊增益信息。  
- **stats** 中仅描述了“剧毒英雄对目标施加神经毒素（增加33%法力消耗）”，属于对敌方的**debuff**，而非对团队或羁绊成员的**增益**。根据规则，仅记录增益效果（如护甲、法强、生命值等），debuff不纳入统计。  
- 因此，该羁绊无符合要求的增益数据。

stats: Predators instantly kill enemies they damage who are below 25% health

Assassin.desc: Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.
stats: +70% Critical Strike Damage & +10% Critical Strike Chance
+210% Critical Strike Damage & +20% Critical Strike Chance

Blademaster.desc: Blademaster Basic Attacks have a 40% chance to trigger additional attacks against their target. These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

Glacial.desc: Basic Attacks from Glacials have 25% chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds, bonus Magic Damage on stun.

Mystic.desc: All allies gain increased Magic Resist

Ranger.desc: Every 3 seconds, Rangers have a chance to double their Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

Shadow.desc: Shadow units deal increased damage for 6 seconds at combat start, refreshed on takedown.

stats: The first Soulbound unit to die in a round will instead enter the Spirit Realm, becoming untargetable and continuing to fight as long as another Soulbound unit is alive.

Steel.desc: Steel Champions gain damage immunity for a few seconds when they are reduced below 50% health

Summoner.desc: Summoned units have increased health and duration
